properties.name: min-pay
properties.description: The minimum amount in satoshis accepted

properties.name: max-pay
properties.description: The maximum amount in satoshis accepted

properties.name: rp-address
properties.description: Address to share for reserve proof validation

properties.name: mass-wallet-filename
properties.description: MASS application wallet filename for tx / rx.

properties.name: mode.rate-lock
properties.description: Set to true to enable locking in price rate for swap duration

properties.name: mode.price-confidence
properties.description: Use this value for price threshold floating when mode.rate-lock is FALSE

properties.name: peer.max
properties.description: Max peers that can connect at once

properties.name: peer.id
properties.description: The peer id tof the application
